span.span: Represents an XML data store for writing and reading user annotations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `stream` 必須是有效的 XML 中格式化並遵守[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]結構描述。`stream` must be in valid XML format and comply with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] schema.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Uri, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Uri>> knownNamespaces) cil managed

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified I/O and dictionary of known compatible namespaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這建構函式可讓應用程式專屬已知命名空間的註冊。This constructor enables the registration of application-specific known namespaces. `knownNamespace`字典中的定義，您將自訂內容儲存為註解的一部分時，會使用應用程式命名空間。The `knownNamespace` dictionary defines application namespaces that are used when you store custom content as part of an annotation. 字典索引鍵是已知的應用程式的主要命名空間。The dictionary key is the primary namespace known to the application program. 命名空間金鑰都與舊版相容的 「 金鑰 」 命名空間的命名空間的值清單。The namespace key is associated with a value list of older namespaces that are compatible with the "key" namespace. 註解載入的所有命名空間從這份清單時將會取代 「 金鑰 」 的命名空間。When annotations are loaded all namespaces from this list will be replaced by the "key" namespace. `stream` 必須是有效的 XML 中格式化並遵守[註解結構描述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md)。`stream` must be in valid XML format and comply with the [Annotations Schema](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/annotations-schema.md).

span.span: is .
contains invalid XML.

exception.span: The dictionary contains a duplicate namespace.

span.span: The dictionary contains a duplicate namespace.

exception.span: -or- The dictionary contains an element that has a key.

span.span: -or- The dictionary contains an element that has a key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Uri> GetWellKnownCompatibleNamespaces(class System.Uri name) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWellKnownCompatibleNamespaces (name As Uri) As IList(Of Uri)

param.name: name
param.span: The starting URI sequence to return the list of namespaces for.

span.span: The starting URI sequence to return the list of namespaces for.

summary.span: Returns a list of namespaces that are compatible as an input namespace.

span.span: Returns a list of namespaces that are compatible as an input namespace.

returns.span: A list of compatible namespaces that match ; otherwise, if there are no compatible namespaces found.

span.span: A list of compatible namespaces that match ; otherwise, if there are no compatible namespaces found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`參數只會針對預先定義的運作方式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]命名空間。The `name` parameter works only for predefined [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] namespaces. 所提供的其他命名空間`name`參數會傳回`null`，即使這些命名空間註冊透過`knownNamespaces`參數建構函式。For any other namespace given in the `name` parameter will return `null`, even those namespaces registered through the `knownNamespaces` parameter of the constructor. 命名空間的預先定義的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]如下：The namespaces predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] include the following: - http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/core - http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/base - http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IgnoredNamespaces As IList(Of Uri)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ IgnoredNamespaces { System::Collections::Generic::IList<Uri ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets a list of the namespaces that were ignored when the XML stream was loaded.

span.span: Gets a list of the namespaces that were ignored when the XML stream was loaded.

value.span: 已載入 XML 資料流時忽略的命名空間清單。

span.span: The list of the namespaces that were ignored when the XML stream was loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永遠不會傳回屬性`null`，不過，傳回的清單可以是空白，如果沒有命名空間會被忽略。The property will never return `null`, however the returned list can be empty if no namespaces are ignored. XML 標記相容性在程式讀取註解內容不同版本所建立時的協助[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]。 helps in XML markup compatibility when the program reads annotation content created by different versions of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]. 當較舊的應用程式有使用較新版本所建立的註解內容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]，傳回項目和屬性不知道舊架構的 XML 命名空間的清單。When an older application is given annotation content created using a newer version of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)], returns a list of the XML namespaces for elements and attributes not known to the older framework. 註解內容只會讀取和還原序列化的舊版應用程式時，會忽略未知的 XML 元素和較新的命名空間相關聯的屬性。Unknown XML elements and attributes associated with newer namespaces are ignored when the annotation content is read and deserialized by the older application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱*XML 標記相容性規格*位於[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824)。For more information see the *XML Markup Compatibility Specification* available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=73824).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間的預先定義的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)]如下：The namespaces predefined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_caf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-caf-md.md)] include the following: - http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/core - http://schemas.microsoft.com/windows/annotations/2003/11/base - http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation
